entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (rebel_title_grant.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_11: What do I get out of it?
entries.s_13: Besides the a chance at real freedom? You receive the official title of 'Rebel Sympathizer'. To wear proudly in defiance!
entries.s_18: How much do I need to donate?
entries.s_26: What do I get out of it?
entries.s_27: How much do I need to donate?
entries.s_29: That is your choice, although the Empire will just take it from you eventually.
entries.s_30: You had best go get those credits now.
entries.s_32: Great! On behalf of the Mon Mothma,  I hereby grant you the title 'Rebel Sympathizer'.
entries.s_33: Wow that's a lot of credits! I don't think I am interested.
entries.s_35: What do I get out of it?
entries.s_37: What do you want? I have done nothing.
entries.s_39: I see you have already contributed to the cause. Thank you.
entries.s_40: Greetings citizen. At this time I only deal with people who want change in our lives.
entries.s_5: Welcome! I am Lt. Jarad Gastin. Are you here to donate to the Alliance for its war on the tyrannical Empire?
entries.s_9: By order of Mon Mothma, we are taking donations to our cause.
